subject: Update to pedals
description_text:
I wanted to know when will have an update so I’m able to play f1 25 because as it stands I can’t play as the pedals are not supported 
Thank you 
Adrian
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Adrian Burke,     Could you let us know what issue you encountered in F1 2025? What is your order number, and which model of pedal are you using? Our technical team has tested our pedals with F1 2025, and everything works normally—just like in F1 2024, with no issues observed.
